Name: Crabby Beach
About the game: Crabby beach - Crab migration season is in full swing! You need to help the main character get to the water, bypassing dangerous obstacles and intrigues of poachers who want to shoot as many crabs as possible! There is no one to rely on, so fight for your life in this unusual platformer, jumping through dangerous nooks and crannies of the coast, along the way taking revenge on poachers by eating their burgers. Can you make it to the end without becoming a snack for the beach dwellers? You, in the role of Kenny the crab, conquer the land, find a way to get back home, bypassing the enemy inhabitants of the land, people, dangerous animals, and sharp spikes are waiting for you on the way! Peculiarities: - Nice graphics by Geovsky - Nice soundtrack by HeadsoundsNK
